Imaging at Vercelli

Before and After MSI Images

No one MSI processed image can capture all of the data available through this non-destructive recovery technique. The images are a small sample of the work we have done on the scrolls at Vercelli.

Videntes MultiSpectral Imaging Collective

Videntes is a multispectral and experimental imaging collective focused on medieval manuscripts in a modern world.
